org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions
Class Docx4JException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.Docx4JException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvalidFormatException, PartUnrecognisedException
public class Docx4JException
extends java.lang.Exception

Global exception throws when a critical error occurs. (this exception is not set as Runtime in order to force user to manage the exception in a try/catch).

See Also:
